---
title: "Ibrahim Abdullahi"
---

Hello,

I am Ibrahim Abdullahi, a graduate student of the department of Economics at Memorial University of Newfoundland and Labrador (MUN) and a research Assistant to Dr. Mustapha Immurana (Senior Research Fellow at University of Health and Allied Sciences). I also serve as a Graduate Teaching Assistant at Department of Economics MUN. My keen research interest span from Health Economics, Labor Economics, Environmental Economics, Energy Economics, Developmental Economics, Machine learning and Causal inference.
